Cherrycake\Modules\Cache::buildCacheKey

buildCacheKey

Returns a cache key to be used in caching operations, based on the provided $config. The keys built can have one of the following syntaxes: <App namespace>_[<prefix>]_<uniqueId> <App namespace>_[<prefix>]_[<specificPrefix>]_<key|encoded sql>

    Signature

    public function buildCacheKey(The $cacheKeyNamingOptions )

    Parameters

    $cacheKeyNamingOptions — object
    config options to build the cache key, holds the following key-value options:
    "prefix": A prefix to use
    "uniqueId": A unique id for the cache key that will override any other specific key identifier config options
    "specificPrefix": A secondary prefix to prepend to provided sql or key config values
    "hash": A string to be hashed as the cache key instead of using "key". For example: A SQL query
    "key": An arbitrary key to uniquely identify the cache key

    Returns

    string
    The final cache key
